errors.generic: Something went wrong. Skill issue I guess...
errors.permission_not_found: I'm missing `{{- perm}}` permissions to use that command.
errors.no_enabled_module: The `{{module}}` is not enabled on this guild.
errors.use_autocomplete: Could not resolve the provided option. Make sure to select an autocomplete option.
errors.target_not_found: The given member is not in this guild.
errors.no_message: Could not find message `{{message_id}}` in channel {{- channel}}
errors.not_message_link: Provided value `{{-val}}` for argument `{{arg}}` is not a valid message link.
errors.no_message_resolvable: Provided value `{{-val}}` for argument `{{arg}}` is not a valid message link or id.
errors.no_channel: Could not find channel `{{channel_id}}` in guild `{{- guild}}`
errors.text_too_long: I can't send messages that are that long ! please limit your message under {{number}}.
errors.already_muted: This member is already muted, you cannot mute this member twice!
errors.message_deleted: An error occurred when deleting the messages, make sure they are not older than 14 days.
errors.valid_amount: Amount must be a valid number and below {{number}}.
errors.no_guild_banned: Nobody was banned from this server.
errors.moderation_denied: Moderation action cannot be done on this member.

errors.no_settings: No guild settings have been initialized yet. Lemme create one for you ! , should work this time...

events.channel_removed: ✅ The channel has been removed , now set to `null`.

errors.no_channel_id: You need to tell me a channel ID to work..
errors.max_length_reason: Maximum length of `{{reason_max_length}}` for reason exceeded.
errors.not_a_text_channel: {{- channel}} is not a text channel.
errors.case_lower_one: Case ids have to be above `0`
errors.already_processed: {{- user}} with case {{- case}} has no running restrictions.
errors.no_tag_found: Unfortunately , no tag has been found for {{name}}

slowmode.success: Successfully put slowmode on {{- channel }} with duration of {{- time}} seconds

ping.success: {{- response}} - Bot latency : {{- bot_latency}}ms , API latency: {{- API_latency}} ms
